I suggest you use FeaturesRunner.getBuildDirectory() istead of the hardcoded target to make sure that the multi-environment tests are completely isolated.
See https://jira.nuxeo.com/browse/NXP-28579 and 7d7a2f9.

timeline.message:
NXP-27559: Use target directory instead of /tmp for CQ files

In containerized env /tmp is not always mapped to volume resulting in probable
cq4 corruption when using overlayFS.

NXP-27559: Lazy initialization of the offset CQ

The offset tracker CQ is now created lazily in the computation runner thread instead
of the main thread

NXP-27559: Fix testConcurrentFileRetentions

Taking lag before starting the processing and not concurrently
NXP-28619 NXP-27559: Re activate CQ unit tests

NXP-27559: Fix SCQIndexing assertion failure by checking tailer state

SCQIndexing.sequenceForPosition has a failure assertion if the state is BEYOND_START_OF_CYCLE
which happens when the queue is not yet fully created
